blog.search_help:
Just type what you're looking for, 3 characters minimum
You can quote text to search for an exact match ("search")
You can search before or after a date (before:YYYY-MM-DD, after:YYYY-MM)
It is also possible to search for a specific date (at:YYYY)
You can filter by tags using tag:name
To search for multiple tags (inclusive), either do tag:name1,name2 or tag:name1 tag:name2
If a tag has spaces, use quotes around it
blog.tag_filter: Filter blog posts by the tag {tag}

about.fav: My favorite technologies at the moment are Vue, TS and Python
about.github: You can check all my projects on my
about.recap: Fullstack dev • Python enthusiast • Fast learner

tagline.1: I'm a versatile junior French developer who like to tackle various programming languages and love open source
tagline.2: Currently searching for a job, I'm passionate and involved in everything I try out

about.title: About

description.1: I learnt here the basics of programmation with Python and SQL
3 years where I learnt Java, SQL, Bash, economy, gestion, english, communication, ...

details: Redesign of the visualization application and migration to Vue.js 3
Addition of advanced data visualization features: filters, sorting and dynamic calculations
Creation and integration of new color palettes in the shared library
Development of a new pie chart visualization in pure SVG in a few days, optimized and independent from any library
Modernization of the back-office as a pair: separation of Docker images, dependency migration and UI improvements
description.summary: A 10 week internship where I learnt how to work in a team, how to use Docker Compose, Vue, Nuxt, ...

details: Update and cleanup of a TypeScript monorepo (Next.js, Fastify, Prisma, …) and improvement of build times
Overhaul of code quality : introduction of OxLint, fixed hundreds of warnings and removal of almost all any's
Improvement of DX & CI : local Actions with act, labels to target jobs, hash tool and Git hooks
Performance & UX improvement : memoization, dynamic import, CSS purge and fixes of UI inconsistencies
Design of a complete module for monitoring SIM card usage (PubSub cron, InfluxDB, PostgreSQL, API, charts and filterable tables)
description.summary: A 16 week internship where I learnt how to work in a large team, how to use Next.js, Fastify, Terraform, InfluxDB, ...

about.1: Written in Python, using libraries like pyrofork and storing data in MongoDB Atlas, this bot aims to provide a seamless experience for getting files from archives on Telegram.
about.2: This bot started being online on the 22nd May of 2022.
about.3: Originally made for Heroku, it is now hosted on Hetzner. And despite costing me every month, it is still free :)
about.title: About

unzip.description: This bot will suit all your archive related needs on Telegram ! It can extract archives (even password protected and split ones), download them from direct URL's, change their thumbnail, rename them, and much more !
unzip.head: unzip-bot - EDM115
